actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to ban from commerce toys which are copies of or resemble firearms or destructive devices.

summary.text: Bans from commerce, under the Federal Hazardous Substances Act, any toy which is a facsimile of, or which resembles, a firearm or other weapon used by the armed forces.

titles.title: A bill to ban from commerce toys which are copies of or resemble firearms or destructive devices.
